comment.text: "Don't display cancellation notification again" is a message that allows users to toggle off the display of a confirmation notification when canceling an operation. This option appears as a button in a file management interface and helps avoid repetitive notifications.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ləğvetmə bildirişini yenidən göstərməyin' is a literal translation but doesn't sound natural in Azerbaijani. It's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like 'Ləğvetmə bildirişini daha sonra göstərməyin' or 'Ləğvetmə bildirişini təkrar göstərməyin'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Να μην εμφανιστεί ξανά η ειδοποίηση ακύρωσης' is a bit literal and sounds unnatural in Greek. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'Don't display again'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μην εμφανίζεται ξανά η ειδοποίηση ακύρωσης

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Նորից չցուցադրել չեղարկման ծանուցումը" is a literal translation but may not be the most natural or user-friendly way to express "Don't display cancellation notification again" in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would improve user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives such as "Միգուշացրել չեղարկման հայտարարությունը" (Migushacrel chelgarkman haytaranum) or "Չի ցուցադրվի չեղարկման հայտարարությունը նորից" (Chi cucadre chi legarkman haytaranum noric).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "キャンセル通知を再表示しない" is technically correct but could be improved for naturalness and conciseness in Japanese UI contexts. A more common and user-friendly phrasing would be "通知を再表示しない" (Notification re-display off/Don't show notification again). The 'キャンセル' (cancellation) is redundant as it's implied by the context.
The translation "취소 알림을 다시 표시하지 않음" is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Korean. A more natural phrasing would emphasize preventing the notification.

The translation 'Não volte a apresentar a notificação de cancelamento' is technically correct but sounds slightly formal and verbose for a user interface setting. A more natural and concise translation would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Não mostrar mais esta notificação de cancelamento

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අහෝසි කිරීමේ දැනුම්දීම නැවත නොදක්වන්න' is a literal translation and sounds somewhat awkward in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be preferable for user interface text.

The translation 'Не приказуј више обавештење о отказивању' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Don't display cancellation notification again'. It's overly literal and sounds clunky in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: More natural options include: 'Не приказуј поново обавештење о отказивању' or 'Искључи обавештење о отказивању' or 'Немој више да приказујеш обавештење о отказивању'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ne prikazuj više obaveštenje o otkazivanju' is a bit literal and not the most natural way to express this in Serbian. While technically correct, it could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ne prikazuj ponovo obaveštenje o otkazivanju

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Không hiển thị lại thông báo hủy' while conveying the general meaning, could be more accurately translated to reflect the original's nuance of 'Don't display cancellation notification again'. The current translation lacks the 'again' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Không hiển thị thông báo hủy nữa
